mapper.insert: insert into download (photo_uciCode, member_seq, ipAddress) values (#{uciCode}, #{memberSeq}, #{ipAddress})
mapper.select: SELECT seq FROM paymentDetail WHERE photo_uciCode = #{uciCode} AND downStart <= NOW() AND downEnd >= NOW() AND paymentManage_seq IN (SELECT seq FROM paymentManage WHERE member_seq = #{memberSeq} AND LGD_PAYSTATUS = 1)

SELECT COUNT(m.seq) as cnt FROM download down INNER JOIN member m ON down.member_seq = m.seq WHERE m.deferred = 2 AND m.seq NOT IN (SELECT member_seq FROM paymentManage)
AND (m.compName LIKE #{keyword} OR m.name LIKE #{keyword} OR m.id LIKE #{keyword})
ORDER BY down.regDate DESC
